title: One Child’s Christmas Miracle | Finding Santa: A Christmas Adventure | Full Family Christmas Movie

sources.title: One Child’s Christmas Miracle | Finding Santa: A Christmas Adventure | Full Family Christmas Movie
sources.description:
One Child’s Christmas Miracle | Finding Santa: A Christmas Adventure | Full Family Christmas Movie - Eight year old Julius lives at an orphanage and secretly believes in Santa Claus until he loses not only his belief in Santa but also himself. But then something strange happens, and suddenly Julius finds himself in a magic world.

Watch Finding Santa: A Christmas Adventure, a full Hallmark Christmas movie where eight-year-old Julius, living in an orphanage, struggles with losing his belief in Santa Claus and himself. But when something magical occurs, he is transported to a wondrous world full of holiday magic and adventure. Perfect for fans of Hallmark Christmas movies, magical holiday films, full free Hallmark Christmas movies, heartwarming festive stories, and enchanting winter adventures, Finding Santa: A Christmas Adventure delivers wonder, joy, and the true spirit of Christmas for the whole family.

Stars: Dennis Storhøi, Bodil Jørgensen, Flora Ofelia Hofmann Lindahl
